properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_TAB = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COMMUNITY_NUMBER, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_TAB, COMMUNITY_VIEWCOUNT, COMMUNITY_DATE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY COMMUNITY_DATE DESC) AS RNUM FROM COMMUNITY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NUMBER)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
